Package ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols

Integration to drive the Hardware of the Raspberry PI using I2C, SPI and PWM

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPwmIn
    Interface for Reading PWM information
    IPwmOut
    Interface for PWM Output
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputFromPiI2C
    I2C is a useful bus that allows data exchange between microcontrollers and peripherals with a minimum of wiring.
    InputFromPiSPI
    SPI is a useful bus that allows data exchange between microcontrollers and peripherals with a minimum of wiring.
    NullDevice
    Dummy input device which generates 0 as values.
    OutputToPiPwm
    Manage Pulse Width Moduleted (PWM) Output to Rasperry PI to drive Servos and Coreless Motors

Package ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols Description

Integration to drive the Hardware of the Raspberry PI using I2C, SPI and PWM
